Berserk:



Berserk snarled as the shot from Dark Mouse hit his shoulder, fraying 
off some of the artificial furs from it. She called stand down, 
something that told him to stop attacking, but she was a stranger. He 
went on with the attack. He slashed at her with his sword just to 
scare her, then grabbed her around the neck with his free hand. He 
spun around and slammed her back into the wall.

"Where am I?" he demanded. 

(Just a reminder, Berserk is a clone of Megatron except his armor is 
different.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> She jumped back and fired at close range, aiming for his 
> shoulder. "STAND DOWN NOW!"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> > Berserk:
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > Berserk leapt into the air, flipping, avoiding the blast as much 
as 
> > he could. He leapt down on Apocolypse, smashing his feet on him 
> with 
> > his heavy weight.
> > 
> > He immediately jumped off, towards Dark Mouse. His claws brought 
> > traction on his landing. He went to grab for her. 
> > 
> >
